channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Uber stokes monopoly fears with plan to pay almost $1bn for its only major food delivery competitor in Taiwan
item.description: Uber, whose meal delivery business outperformed globally during the most recent quarter, aims to complete the all-cash deal by the first half of 2025.

item.title: The 2024 CNBC Disruptor 50 full list: OpenAI becomes first back-to-back No. 1 company
item.description: CNBC reveals the 2024 Disruptor 50 list, AI-driven startups moving beyond the 'better, faster, cheaper' mantra that defined Silicon Valley's past.

item.title: Switzerland shouldn't follow Europe's lead on tax, says Roche CEO
item.description: Europe is falling behind China and the U.S. in competitiveness, according to Thomas Schinecker, Roche CEO.

item.title: Tuesday's analyst calls: Nvidia earnings preview, gym stock gets an upgrade
item.description: Nvidia and a major gym stock were among the biggest names talked about by analysts on Tuesday.

item.title: Emmanuel Macron woos Wall Street as he tries to position Paris as Europe’s top financial hub, calling Basel banking regulations 'a killer for risk taking'
item.description: The push to lure more business to Paris has translated into more than 7,000 extra jobs in the financial sector between 2017 and 2022.

item.title: Home Depot misses on revenue, as high interest rates hurt sales
item.description: Home Depot reported first-quarter earnings as it tries to grow sales with home professionals in a tough housing market.

item.title: BYD has been frozen out of the U.S. market so it’s debuting its first hybrid pickup truck in Mexico
item.description: While BYD has said previously the Shark will be distributed globally, the automaker doesn’t have any plans to sell in the U.S. at the moment.

item.title: Diamond giant De Beers faces spin-off as Anglo American takeover pressure mounts
item.description: Anglo American shares fell over 3% early Tuesday after it announced plans to spin off its highly prized De Beers diamond business.

item.title: Vodafone turnaround: $11.9 billion earnings and a return to growth in Germany, but 'much more still needs to be done'
item.description: Vodafone is increasing its focus on the German market and exiting unprofitable ones, as part of CEO Della Valle’s turnaround strategy.

item.title: Biden raises tariffs on $18 billion of Chinese imports: EVs, solar panels, batteries and more
item.description: Biden Cabinet members like Janet Yellen, Gina Raimondo and Antony Blinken have all raised concerns about Chinese trade practices.
